mapper.insert: insert into GoodsPrice values ('0',(select max(num) from Goods),#{price},#{product})
mapper.update: update Goods set currentPrice = currentPrice+#{price} where num=#{goodsNum}
mapper.select: select g.title,g.goodsNum,g.price,p.product,g.wantPrice,g.currentPrice from goodsprice p, (SELECT g.title,pay.price,g.currentPrice,g.wantPrice,pay.goodsnum FROM goodspay pay,Goods g where pay.userid=#{id} and pay.goodsnum = g.num) g where p.price = g.price and p.goodsNum = g.goodsnum limit #{page},4

select count(a.goodsNum) from( select g.title,g.goodsNum,g.price,p.product,g.wantPrice,g.currentPrice from goodsprice p, (SELECT g.title,pay.price,g.currentPrice,g.wantPrice,pay.goodsnum FROM goodspay pay,Goods g where pay.userid=#{id} and pay.goodsnum = g.num) g where p.price = g.price and p.goodsNum = g.goodsnum ) a
